titleInfo.title: Analysis of Indoor Team Sports Using Video Tracking and Wireless Sensor Network

mods.abstract: Our analysis system, consisting of a high resolution video system together with a wireless sensor network, is used for collecting position and physiologi- cal data of sport players during training or competition. The combination of the two data streams provides a new type of performance analysis and visu- alisation solution for indoor team sports.

titleInfo.title: World Congress of Performance Analysis of Sport VIII
